name: Hevnsdør
description:
A little game made for Ludum Dare 42 Jam, themed "Running out of space"

Heaven is running out of space.

What will you do when you are given the power to choose who gets in and who doesn't?

Controls:
* AWSD or Arrows to move
* Space to interact
* Mouse to click on buttons
* ESC to quit game

Tip:
You can hover over deeds to view details about them
(though not all of them will have details)

Credits for stuff used:
